name: Razer Imperator Mass Effect 3 Edition Wired Laser Mouse
Features: [6400dpi 4G Dual Sensor System, Razer synapse onboard memory, On-the-fly sensitivity adjustment, Unlock the deadly collector assault rifle, Rubberized contoured thumb grip, Up to 200 inches per second / 50G acceleration, Zero-acoustic ultraslick mouse feet, Customizable side button placement to suit all hand sizes, Independently programmable hyperesponse buttons]
